copy.title: FAQ features - Clickeen
copy.description: The definitive answer engine. Speed, SEO, and AI built in.

copy.headline: The answer engine
copy.subheadline: Speed. SEO section. AI. The definitive FAQ infrastructure.

copy.headline: Don't write. Just describe.
copy.subheadline: Natural language editing powered by Ombra.
copy.body: Turn your intent into code. Describe the change you want, and the widget builds itself.

copy.headline: 29 languages. One toggle.
copy.body: Zero-effort localization. We detect the visitor's locale and serve the right answer instantly.

copy.headline: Write once. Run everywhere.
copy.body: Your website. Your app. Your help center. Your email footer. Power them all from one dashboard.

items.title: Google sees every word
items.body: Server-side rendering means zero layout shift and perfect indexability.

items.title: Rich snippets
items.body: Automatic JSON-LD injection helps you dominate search results.

items.title: Deep linking
items.body: Point users to the specific answer they need with a stable URL.

copy.headline: Built for the next decade
copy.body: A living knowledge base that grows with you.

items.title: Mistake-proof
items.body: Every change is versioned. Revert instantly if you break something.

items.title: Immutable
items.body: What you publish is exactly what they see. No surprises.

items.title: Edge-Cached
items.body: Milliseconds matter. We deliver answers from the location nearest your user.

copy.title: Design usually requires compromise. Not here.
Architected for excellence
copy.subhead: The technical foundation of the world's best sites.
